acqinfo.p: The record group was the gift of Victor Lemmer (donor no. 2643)

accruals.p: No further aadditions to the records not expected.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open to research.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, John A. Bobb Camp No. 45 (United Spanish War Veterans) records, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The United Spanish War Veterans Organization is open to veterans of three wars: the Spanish-American War, the Philippine Insurrection, and the Boxer Rebellion. In 1918-19, in the Ironwood area of Michigan's Upper Peninsula, veterans of these campaigns organized to form the John A. Bobb Camp No. 45 of the United Spanish War Veterans Organization. The purpose of the organization was both fraternal and social, as well as to petition members of Congress on behalf of veterans pension legislation.

scopecontent.p: The record group is composed of a single series of Organizational records, including minutes, correspondence, membership material, reports, and financial records.
